techmeme.title: US SEC Chair Paul Atkins says blockchains could enable novel securities use cases and "policymaking will no longer result from ad hoc enforcement actions" (Christopher Tepedino/Cointelegraph)
Galaxy S25 Edge hands-on: sturdy, thin design is a breath of fresh air, and many specs match the S25, but the 3,900 mAh battery is down from the S25's 4,000 mAh (Abrar Al-Heeti/CNET)
Theom, which helps businesses safeguard and track sensitive data, raised a $20M Series A led by Wing VC, after an oversubscribed $16.4M seed in late 2022 (Angus Loten/Wall Street Journal)
Samsung unveils the $1,100+ Galaxy S25 Edge, which is 5.8mm thick and weighs 163g, making it 30% thinner and 25% lighter than the S25 Ultra, arriving on May 30 (Bloomberg)
In the age of deepfakes, some people are using tactics like asking rapid-fire questions or sharing code words with each other to verify identity online (Lauren Goode/Wired)
